Key Match Events: The match ended in a penalty shootout with Poland winning 5-4 after a 0-0 draw.
Pre-Game Insights: Wales had home advantage and were considered the better team by their manager Robert Page.
Post-Match Reflections: Wales manager Robert Page expressed disappointment over the loss, stating it was a cruel game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Cardiff City Stadium with an attendance of 31,876.
Others: The referee for the match was Daniele Orsato.
